title: Run Annual Benefits Open Enrollment
description: An HR benefits specialist needs to manage the company's annual open enrollment period.

tasks.description: Configure the benefits administration system for the new plan year, including updated rates and plan options.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist successfully sets up the system for open enrollment.

tasks.description: Send a series of communications to employees announcing open enrollment and explaining the changes for the new year.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist drafts and schedules all employee communications.

tasks.description: Track employee enrollment progress and send reminders to those who have not yet completed their elections.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist monitors the completion dashboard and sends targeted reminders.
